title: Who Is Brooke Schofield Engaged To? Miles McFly’s Relationship Explained
description: Curious to discover who Brooke Schofield is currently engaged to? author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Who is Brooke Schofield engaged to? For fans searching for answers, here's everything about her fiancé and their relationship.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Curious to discover who Brooke Schofield is currently engaged to? The TikTok creator, podcast host, and co-host of Cancelled has recently sparked widespread discussion for her recent relationship with her significant other. So, here’s everything you need to know about Schofield’s fiancé, how their relationship came about, and the details surrounding it so far. Who is Brooke Schofield’s fiancé? Brooke Schofield’s is engaged to Miles McFly. While Schofield is a public personality, her fiancé prefers staying away from the limelight. Apart from that, even she rarely posts pictures with McFly on her social media platforms. However, according to HerCampus, McFly’s birth name is Miles Canton. He is reportedly the son of film producer Neil Canton, who is known for his work on the Back To The Future trilogy. Brooke Schofield and Miles McFly’s relationship history The details of how Brooke Schofield and her fiancé Miles McFly first met remain largely a mystery, but their relationship became public knowledge in October or November 2024. Initially, the two chose to keep their romance discreet and private on social media, despite facing numerous controversies. Shortly after Schofield started dating Canton, rumors emerged that he had allegedly been dating a minor while he was in his mid-to-late 20s. In response, Schofield stood up for Canton in the comments of one of her TikTok videos. However, after keeping her audience curious, Brooke Schofield officially announced that she is engaged to Miles McFly in June 2025. She shared the news on Instagram, posting a series of carousel images, captioned “Engagement-moon.” They showcased her engagement ring along with snaps of herself and her partner in Cabo, Mexico. Brooke Schofield and Miles McFly’s relationship has been anything but conventional. It has been marked by intense loyalty, quiet milestones, and growing public scrutiny. Despite the controversy surrounding McFly’s past, the couple has remained united, with Schofield standing firmly by his side. As they enter a new phase of their relationship, fans are elated for the couple.
html:
Curious to discover who Brooke Schofield is currently engaged to? The TikTok creator, podcast host, and co-host of Cancelled has recently sparked widespread discussion for her recent relationship with her significant other.

So, here’s everything you need to know about Schofield’s fiancé, how their relationship came about, and the details surrounding it so far.

Who is Brooke Schofield’s fiancé?

Brooke Schofield’s is engaged to Miles McFly.

While Schofield is a public personality, her fiancé prefers staying away from the limelight. Apart from that, even she rarely posts pictures with McFly on her social media platforms. However, according to HerCampus, McFly’s birth name is Miles Canton. He is reportedly the son of film producer Neil Canton, who is known for his work on the Back To The Future trilogy.

Brooke Schofield and Miles McFly’s relationship history

The details of how Brooke Schofield and her fiancé Miles McFly first met remain largely a mystery, but their relationship became public knowledge in October or November 2024.

Initially, the two chose to keep their romance discreet and private on social media, despite facing numerous controversies. Shortly after Schofield started dating Canton, rumors emerged that he had allegedly been dating a minor while he was in his mid-to-late 20s. In response, Schofield stood up for Canton in the comments of one of her TikTok videos.

However, after keeping her audience curious, Brooke Schofield officially announced that she is engaged to Miles McFly in June 2025. She shared the news on Instagram, posting a series of carousel images, captioned “Engagement-moon.” They showcased her engagement ring along with snaps of herself and her partner in Cabo, Mexico.

Brooke Schofield and Miles McFly’s relationship has been anything but conventional. It has been marked by intense loyalty, quiet milestones, and growing public scrutiny. Despite the controversy surrounding McFly’s past, the couple has remained united, with Schofield standing firmly by his side. As they enter a new phase of their relationship, fans are elated for the couple.
